data.text:
Let's begin with this hotel was around the corner from the famed  Casa Battló. We were steps from Las Ramblas, The Montjuïc, and Port Vell. So very well situated.

The hotel would easily be missed as it is a narrow entryway amongst many doorways and there is no doorman. Upon entry through automated glass doors there is a beautiful staircase or you can take the elevator up to check-in. Elevators in Europe are very small. Either two people or one person and a suitcase - keep this in mind always. We were early, so we did check in and our luggage was tagged and we had the chits. We took a walk and returned to go to the room.

The hallways were quiet, beautifully painted and black sconces adorned the walls. The room was SMALL and very tasteful. The bathroom was HUGE actually and had everything we needed - towels, hair dryer, tissue, soap, etc. 

The bed was also huge and pretty much took up all the space. Comfortable for sure. The wallpaper was sweet and all the curtained areas made the space feel feminine, safe and nesty. 

The wardrobe was small but did what it should. We had a fridge as well. One curiosity of the room was an enclosed balcony. It didn't FEEL like a balcony but I can't imagine what else it was. It felt like something from maybe the 1900s and I loved it! French doors, a writing desk and chair, and lamp. I kept my suitcase there. It looked over an empty parking area and up at I think apartments. At night, I closed the doors and pulled the heavy drapes to darken the room. 

We had daily cleaning service and that was that. Clean, cute, well-located. The building next door housed a small supermarket if you need ANYTHING. Which was perfect.
data.title: Chraming and Curious

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jasmine,

We appreciate your positive feedback about your experience at One Shot Aragó! It's wonderful to know that you found our hotel and service to your liking. We can't wait to host you again and ensure your next stay is just as memorable.

Warm regards,
Òscar Orenga
owner_response.author: Óscar Orenga

data.text:
Lovely clean and stylish hotel 
Prime location - but not noisy at all
Room cleaned daily
Toiletries were lovely (not sure of brand)
Staff helpful although we only saw them at check in and departure as they were on a different floor
Only thing this hotel is missing is a kitchen - would be nice to order breakfast 
Otherwise excellent stay - thank you
data.title: Lovely central stylish hotel

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Susan,

Sincere thanks for choosing One Shot Aragó for your stay in Barcelona. Your satisfaction during your visit is our top priority, and we're delighted to have contributed to making your time in the city special. We look forward to hosting you again soon for another unforgettable stay.

Best wishes,
Òscar Orenga
owner_response.author: Óscar Orenga

data.text:
This was our first international trip as a couple for my fiancé and I. I and he let me choose the hotel and I was so happy with my choice this hotel was prefect!

The staff was great when we checked in early and we got to check into our room a few hours early! Which was amazing I needed a nap and shower after our flights from the states. 

Our room was my the elevator and we didn’t here much. Super comfortable and quiet room. Loved that it was cozy - yes it’s small but we don’t need too much of room since you are in the heart of Barcelona. This hotel is in a great location to restaurants, the sights, the metro, and of course shopping!

The bed was very comfortable and I loved that we could stream our HBO max from our phone to the TV. That made the room. 

Next door to the hotel is a little convenience store where we got late night snacks and water. 

I would totally book this room again!

Oh and loved the mirrors in the room so while my fiancé was in the bathroom I could finish my makeup
data.title: Prefect stay!

data.text:
Very well located in the heart of the city. The main street Passeig De Gracia is just few steps away. Metro station is not too far. Great location for shopping and sightseeing

The hotel is clean and big enough for two.
The price is reasonable, not too expensive. The staff is helpful too..
data.title: Nice location

data.text: Location is excellent and the reception staff are very nice and helpful. The room is spacious and the bed is clean and comfortable. The hotel has no kitchen to order food to your room and there is no breakfast is available. The windows are very old and has no insulation, so very very noisy, as the hotel is on a busy main road.
data.title: Barcelona first time

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Madi,

Thank you so much for your positive review and for taking the time to share your experience at One Shot Aragó. We're thrilled that you appreciated our central location in the heart of Barcelona.

Your feedback is highly valuable to us, and we want to express our gratitude for bringing up the concern regarding the soundproofing in the rooms. We understand the importance of a quiet and restful environment, and rest assured, we will take your suggestions into serious consideration as we continuously strive to enhance our guests' experiences.

We're honored that you chose to stay with us, and we hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back. If you decide to return, we'll make every effort to ensure a more enjoyable and comfortable stay.

Once again, thank you for your constructive feedback.

Warm regards,

Òscar Orenga
Front Desk Manager
One Shot Aragó
owner_response.author: Óscar Orenga
